title: Of the Andromeda Martian Catastrophe
description: This is an investigation into the Atlantean Mermaids war with the Andromeda Martians who invaded our solar system during its protostar stage with a wandering brown dwarf and the catastrophe that happened. The book presents 21 Polestar Science Theories that range from astronomy, astrophysics, particle physics, quantum physics, string theory, M-brane theory, and more. In-depth research of the solar system and a closer look at Mars and the gas giants. The book reveals the destiny or fate of the human race in the future intergalactic war with the Andromeda.
author: Vegas Luna
